name: Only You Can Try In Vain To Prevent Forest Fires On An Active Volcano
name_original: Only You Can Try In Vain To Prevent Forest Fires On An Active Volcano
description:
"Dig ditches to route the lava around the trees!"

INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - RUN

Mouse Left-Click/Left-Ctrl - DIG

Space Bar/Mouse Right-Click - JUMP
